title: Visting Georgetown Professor Among Those Egypt Sentences To Death
teaser: Renee Montagne talks to Emad Shahin, one of more than 100 Egyptians who received a death sentence, along with ex-President Morsi, for alleged roles in events surrounding Hosni Mubarak's overthrow.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
